Description: View of Luxor; colonnade of columns and capitals showing above wall leading into distant r, dwelling to left with two men seated before door by fire, camel being lead by man towards right from centre. 1839 Watercolour with graphite with bodycolour
Bibliographic references: Binyon 1898-1907 / Catalogue of drawings by British artists, and artists of foreign origin working in Great Britain (30)
Exhibition history: 1983 May-Jul, Brighton AG, 'Egypt & The British', no. 291 1983 Aug-Sep, Manchester AG, 'Egypt & The British', no. 291 1991 Sept-Nov, Bristol AG, 'Muller', no. 105
